level.text: Only a person currently licensed, as a registered nurse under Chapter 54 of this title shall be eligible to apply for a license to practice as a nurse-practitioner under this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 36 DCR 3505 (May 12, 1989); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 11751 (December 27, 2002).
